transfer.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens to a given address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens from one address to another, using the allowance mechanism.

approve.description: Sets the amount of tokens that an owner allows a spender to use.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to use.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to use.

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR.description: Returns the domain separator used in EIP-712 signatures.

balanceOf.description: Returns the token balance of a specified address.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that an owner allows a spender to use.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals the token uses.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

getVotes.description: Returns the number of votes held by a specified address.

delegates.description: Returns the address of the delegatee for a specified account.

delegate.description: Delegates voting power to a specified address.

delegateBySig.description: Delegates voting power to a specified address via signature.

getPastVotes.description: Returns the number of votes held by a specified address at a past block.

getPastTotalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens at a past block.

checkpoints.description: Returns the checkpoint data for a specified account at a given position.

numCheckpoints.description: Returns the number of checkpoints for a specified account.

permit.description: Allows a spender to use tokens on behalf of the owner via signature.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

owner.description: Returns the current owner of the contract.

nonces.description: Returns the nonce for a specified address.
